deletedOn.description: If the meshCustomer has already been deleted, the <<data_types,date>> when deletion happened is provided via this field. e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`

name.description: The customerIdentifier as 'name' to uniquely identify the meshCustomer.

createdOn.description: The meshCustomer has been created at this <<data_types,date>> (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`).

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' to uniquely identify the meshCustomer. Can additionally contain meta information like the meshCustomer creation date.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshCustomer datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshCustomer' for this endpoint.

displayName.description: The display name of the meshCustomer as it is shown in meshPanel.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshCustomer. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshCustomer.
